name: David Haye's Jungle Rumble
description:
David has his jungle holiday interrupted by his arch-enemies. Take control of the former Heavy Weight Champion and apply the noble and gentlemanly art of boxing to the faces of all in his way!

* Action-packed, face-stomping fun!
* Stunning visuals on the new iPhone and iPad!
* Leader boards, challenges and achievements!

* Will you become the next Jungle Rumble champion? You have the chance to win some signed Hayemaker merchandise and a personal training session with David!

* GOLD champ: best player of all time!
* SILVER champ: best player of the week!
* BRONZE champ: best player of the day!

Rio Ferdinand ‏- "Its proper addictive!"

Katie 'Jordan' Price ‏- "Best game I ever played!"

Mark Wright ‏- "addictive and proper hardcore!"

* Warning, this game is highly addictive! We accept no responsibility for missed appointments, loss of earnings, or urinating in your own trousers.

* Visit Hayemaker.com for the latest news and merchandise!
